pages.title: Amaranth
pages.text: Though seemingly left behind for quite some time now, these seeds still look very much alive. You wonder what comes out of it when grown?
You never have seen anything like it. Such an intense red. So expressive!$(br)These Bushels can be crushed to get more grains.$(br2)They can also be planted decoratively on grass or in a flower pot.

pages.title: Honey Pastry
pages.text: The taste of Amaranth is as different from Wheat as its appearance. In your mind sprouted completely new ideas, like this deliciousness here.
